00029 #ifndef CELLPROPERTYREGISTRY_HPP_
00030 #define CELLPROPERTYREGISTRY_HPP_
00031 
00032 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00033 #include <vector>
00034 
00035 #include "AbstractCellProperty.hpp"
00036 
00037 #include "ChasteSerialization.hpp"
00038 #include <boost/serialization/shared_ptr.hpp>
00039 #include <boost/serialization/vector.hpp>
00040 
00044 class CellPropertyRegistry
00045 {
00046 public:
00053     template<class SUBCLASS>
00054     boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellProperty> Get();
00055 
00059     static CellPropertyRegistry* Instance();
00060 
00064     const std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellProperty> >& rGetAllCellProperties();
00065 
00069     void Clear();
00070 
00079     CellPropertyRegistry* TakeOwnership();
00080 
00089     void SpecifyOrdering(const std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellProperty> >& rOrdering);
00090 
00094     bool HasOrderingBeenSpecified();
00095 
00096 private:
00097 
00101     CellPropertyRegistry();
00102 
00106     CellPropertyRegistry(const CellPropertyRegistry&);
00107 
00111     CellPropertyRegistry& operator= (const CellPropertyRegistry&);
00112 
00116     static CellPropertyRegistry* mpInstance;
00117 
00121     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellProperty> > mCellProperties;
00122 
00124     bool mOrderingHasBeenSpecified;
00125 
00127     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00134     template<class Archive>
00135     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00136     {
00137         archive & mCellProperties;
00138         archive & mOrderingHasBeenSpecified;
00139     }
00140 };
00141 
00142 template<class SUBCLASS>
00143 boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellProperty> CellPropertyRegistry::Get()
00144 {
00145     boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellProperty> p_property;
00146     for (unsigned i=0; i<mCellProperties.size(); i++)
00147     {
00148         if (mCellProperties[i]->IsType<SUBCLASS>())
00149         {
00150             p_property = mCellProperties[i];
00151             break;
00152         }
00153     }
00154     if (!p_property)
00155     {
00156         // Create a new cell property
00157         p_property.reset(new SUBCLASS);
00158         mCellProperties.push_back(p_property);
00159     }
00160     return p_property;
00161 }
00162 
00163 #endif /* CELLPROPERTYREGISTRY_HPP_ */
